languages.text: {n}Странное шевеление под ладонью отвлекает вас от вскрика спутницы. Как только вы передвигаете ониксовую фигуру {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g} ближе к вражеской, яростный крик врывается в ваше сознание потоком чужих чувств. Друкари проскальзывает меж ваших пальцев и жестоко отсекает стоящему напротив Азуриани руки и ноги, а стоящая позади женская фигура Азуриани тут же стреляет в ответ из своего оружия. Разряд обжигающей боли проходит сквозь ваше тело, когда поверженная фигура друкари расползается по полю бесформенной массой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Странное шевеление под ладонью отвлекает вас от вскрика спутницы. Как только вы передвигаете ониксовую фигуру {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g} ближе к вражеской, яростный крик врывается в ваше сознание потоком чужих чувств. Друкари проскальзывает меж ваших пальцев и жестоко отсекает стоящему напротив эльдару руки и ноги, а стоящая позади фигура эльдарки тут же стреляет в ответ из своего оружия. Разряд обжигающей боли проходит сквозь ваше тело, когда поверженная фигура друкари расползается по полю бесформенной массой.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}A strange movement under your palm distracts you from your companion's shriek. As soon as you move one of the onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} closer to an opposing piece, a fierce cry bursts into your consciousnesses in a torrent of feelings that aren't your own. The Drukhari slips through your fingers and brutally slashes off the arms and legs of the male Asuryani facing it. From behind, a female Asuryani figurine reacts by firing its weapon. A blast of searing pain rips through your body as the defeated Drukhari piece dissolves into a shapeless mass on the board.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Странное шевеление под ладонью отвлекает вас от вскрика спутницы. Как только вы передвигаете ониксовую фигуру {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g} ближе к вражеской, яростный крик врывается в ваше сознание потоком чужих чувств. Друкари проскальзывает меж ваших пальцев и жестоко отсекает стоящему напротив Азуриани руки и ноги, а стоящая позади женская фигура Азуриани тут же стреляет в ответ из своего оружия. Разряд обжигающей боли проходит сквозь ваше тело, когда поверженная фигура друкари расползается по полю бесформенной массой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A strange movement under your palm distracts you from your companion's shriek. As soon as you move one of the onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} closer to an opposing piece, a fierce cry bursts into your consciousnesses in a torrent of feelings that aren't your own. The Drukhari slips through your fingers and brutally slashes off the arms and legs of the Aeldari facing it. From behind, a female Aeldari figurine reacts by firing its weapon at once. A blast of searing pain rips through your body as the defeated Drukhari piece dissolves into a shapeless mass on the board.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Notas un extraño movimiento bajo la palma de tu mano que te distrae del chillido de tu compañera. Nada más acercar uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} de ónice a una pieza rival, un feroz grito irrumpe en tu mente acompañado de un torrente de emociones que no son tuyas. La pieza Drukhari se escurre entre tus dedos y cercena brutalmente los brazos y piernas del Asuryani que tiene delante. Desde detrás, la miniatura de otra Asuryani reacciona disparando su arma. Un dolor atroz te recorre el cuerpo mientras la pieza Drukhari derrotada se disuelve en una masa informe sobre el tablero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange movement under your palm distracts you from your companion's shriek. As soon as you move one of the onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} closer to an opposing piece, a fierce cry bursts into your consciousnesses in a torrent of feelings that aren't your own. The Drukhari slips through your fingers and brutally slashes off the arms and legs of the male Asuryani facing it. From behind, a female Asuryani figurine reacts by firing its weapon. A blast of searing pain rips through your body as the defeated Drukhari piece dissolves into a shapeless mass on the board.{/n}

Nada más acercar uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} de ónice a una pieza rival, un feroz grito irrumpe en tu mente acompañado de un torrente de emociones que no son tuyas. La pieza Drukhari se escurre entre tus dedos y cercena brutalmente los brazos y piernas del Asuryani que tiene delante. Desde detrás, la miniatura de otra Asuryani reacciona disparando su arma. Un dolor atroz te recorre el cuerpo mientras la pieza Drukhari derrotada se disuelve en una masa informe sobre el tablero.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}手のひらの下の奇妙な動きによって、仲間の悲鳴からあなたの注意がそれた。オニキスの{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}をあなたが相手の駒に近づけた途端、自分のものではない感情の奔流と同時に激しい叫び声が意識に押し寄せる。デュカーリがあなたの指をすり抜け、対峙している男性アシュリヤーニの腕と脚を残酷に切り落とした。背後から女性のアシュリヤーニの小像が反応し、武器を発砲する。倒されたデュカーリが盤上で形のない塊と化すと、焼けるような痛みがあなたの体を襲った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange movement under your palm distracts you from your companion's shriek. As soon as you move one of the onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} closer to an opposing piece, a fierce cry bursts into your consciousnesses in a torrent of feelings that aren't your own. The Drukhari slips through your fingers and brutally slashes off the arms and legs of the male Asuryani facing it. From behind, a female Asuryani figurine reacts by firing its weapon. A blast of searing pain rips through your body as the defeated Drukhari piece dissolves into a shapeless mass on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}手のひらの下の奇妙な動きによって、仲間の悲鳴からあなたの注意がそれた。オニキスの{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}をあなたが相手の駒に近づけた途端、自分のものではない感情の奔流と同時に激しい叫び声が意識に押し寄せる。デュカーリがあなたの指をすり抜け、対峙している男性アシュリヤーニの腕と脚を残酷に切り落とした。背後から女性のアシュリヤーニの小像が反応し、武器を発砲する。倒されたデュカーリが盤上で形のない塊と化すと、焼けるような痛みがあなたの体を襲った。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}此时此刻，你手掌之下的棋子发出了古怪的动静，吸引了你的注意。当你将一颗黑玛瑙制成的{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}移向另一颗棋子时，你的意识中爆发出一声惨烈的嚎叫，但这样的声音并非源自你本身。那枚黑暗灵族棋子从你的指间滑过，残忍地砍断了它面前男性方舟灵族棋子的胳膊和腿，而后方的女性方舟灵族棋子举起武器，朝它进行了反击。黑暗灵族棋子被击败了，它的碎片在棋盘上融化成了一团不成形的东西，随后，一阵灼热的疼痛刺穿了你的身体。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange movement under your palm distracts you from your companion's shriek. As soon as you move one of the onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} closer to an opposing piece, a fierce cry bursts into your consciousnesses in a torrent of feelings that aren't your own. The Drukhari slips through your fingers and brutally slashes off the arms and legs of the male Asuryani facing it. From behind, a female Asuryani figurine reacts by firing its weapon. A blast of searing pain rips through your body as the defeated Drukhari piece dissolves into a shapeless mass on the board.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un étrange mouvement sous votre paume détourne votre attention du hurlement de votre camarade. Dès que vous approchez un pion d'onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}drukhari{/g} d'une pièce adverse, un cri farouche retentit dans votre conscience, ainsi qu'un torrent d'émotions qui ne vous appartiennent pas. Le Drukhari glisse entre vos doigts et tranche brutalement les bras et les jambes de l'homme asuryani qui lui fait face. Derrière, une figurine asuryani d'apparence féminine réagit en tirant de son arme. Une explosion de douleur secoue votre corps lorsque le pion drukhari vaincu se délite en une masse informe sur le plateau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange movement under your palm distracts you from your companion's shriek. As soon as you move one of the onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} closer to an opposing piece, a fierce cry bursts into your consciousnesses in a torrent of feelings that aren't your own. The Drukhari slips through your fingers and brutally slashes off the arms and legs of the male Asuryani facing it. From behind, a female Asuryani figurine reacts by firing its weapon. A blast of searing pain rips through your body as the defeated Drukhari piece dissolves into a shapeless mass on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un étrange mouvement sous votre paume détourne votre attention du hurlement de votre camarade. Dès que vous approchez un pion d'onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}drukhari{/g} d'une pièce adverse, un cri farouche retentit dans votre conscience, ainsi qu'un torrent d'émotions qui ne vous appartiennent pas. Le Drukhari glisse entre vos doigts et tranche brutalement les bras et les jambes de l'homme asuryani qui lui fait face. Derrière, une figurine asuryani d'apparence féminine réagit en tirant de son arme. Une explosion de douleur secoue votre corps lorsque le pion drukhari vaincu se délite en une masse informe sur le plateau.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Eine sonderbare Bewegung unter deiner Handfläche lenkt dich vom Schrei deiner Gefährtin ab. Als du einen der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} aus Onyx näher an eine gegnerische Figur heranschiebst, wird dein Bewusstsein von einem markerschütternden Schrei durchdrungen, eine Flut von Gefühlen, die nicht zu dir gehören. Der Drukhari rutscht dir durch die Finger nach vorne und schneidet dem männlichen Asuryani, der ihm gegenübersteht, brutal die Arme und Beine ab. Von weiter hinten reagiert eine weibliche Asuryani-Figur darauf, indem sie ihre Waffe abfeuert. Dir fährt ein stechender Schmerz durch den Körper und die besiegte Drukhari-Figur löst sich auf dem Spielbrett in eine formlose Masse auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange movement under your palm distracts you from your companion's shriek. As soon as you move one of the onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} closer to an opposing piece, a fierce cry bursts into your consciousnesses in a torrent of feelings that aren't your own. The Drukhari slips through your fingers and brutally slashes off the arms and legs of the male Asuryani facing it. From behind, a female Asuryani figurine reacts by firing its weapon. A blast of searing pain rips through your body as the defeated Drukhari piece dissolves into a shapeless mass on the board.{/n}

Als du einen der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} aus Onyx näher an eine gegnerische Figur heranschiebst, wird dein Bewusstsein von einem markerschütternden Schrei durchdrungen, eine Flut von Gefühlen, die nicht zu dir gehören. Der Drukhari rutscht dir durch die Finger nach vorne und schneidet dem männlichen Asuryani, der ihm gegenübersteht, brutal die Arme und Beine ab. Von weiter hinten reagiert eine weibliche Asuryani-Figur darauf, indem sie ihre Waffe abfeuert. Dir fährt ein stechender Schmerz durch den Körper und die besiegte Drukhari-Figur löst sich auf dem Spielbrett in eine formlose Masse auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avucunun altındaki garip hareketlilik, dikkatini yoldaşının feryadından uzaklaştırıyor. Oniks {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharilerden{/g} birini rakip taşlara yaklaştırmanla birlikte, sana ait olmayan hislerin seline kapılmış zihninde şiddetli bir çığlık kopuyor. Drukhari, parmaklarından kayıp giderek karşısındaki erkek Asuryani'nin kolları ile bacaklarını gaddarca koparıyor. Bir dişi Asuryani figürü, arkasından silahını ateşleyerek tepki veriyor. Yenilen Drukhari taşı tahta üzerinde şekilsiz bir kütleye dönüşürken ortaya çıkan şiddetli acılar, bedenini kırıp geçiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange movement under your palm distracts you from your companion's shriek. As soon as you move one of the onyx {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} closer to an opposing piece, a fierce cry bursts into your consciousnesses in a torrent of feelings that aren't your own. The Drukhari slips through your fingers and brutally slashes off the arms and legs of the male Asuryani facing it. From behind, a female Asuryani figurine reacts by firing its weapon. A blast of searing pain rips through your body as the defeated Drukhari piece dissolves into a shapeless mass on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avucunun altındaki garip hareketlilik, dikkatini yoldaşının feryadından uzaklaştırıyor. Oniks {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhariler{/g}den birini rakip parçalara yaklaştırmanla birlikte, sana ait olmayan hislerin seline kapılmış zihninde şiddetli bir çığlık kopuyor. Drukhari, parmaklarından kayıp giderek karşısındaki erkek Asuryani'nin kolları ile bacaklarını gaddarca koparıyor. Bir kadın Asuryani figürü, arkasından silahını ateşleyerek tepki veriyor. Yenilen Drukhari parçası, tahta üzerinde şekilsiz bir kütleye dönüşürken ortaya çıkan şiddetli acılar, bedenini kırıp geçiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
